statements: DELETE FROM agroforestry_management_data WHERE tree_species = 'Oak' AND height_in_meters > 3.5;
DELETE FROM agroforestry_management_data WHERE id = 1 AND tree_species = 'Oak';
DELETE FROM agroforestry_management_data WHERE planting_date < '2021-01-01' AND (height_in_meters > 10 OR diameter_in_cm < 5);
DELETE FROM management_logs WHERE tree_id = 15 AND supervisor_id = 5;
DELETE FROM agroforestry_sustainability WHERE plant_id = '684c0e1d-0f00-4547-a7ca-733e7ee4645d' AND assessment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Plantation WHERE plantation_name = 'Garden of Eden';
DELETE FROM Harvest WHERE yield > 100 AND harvest_date < '2022-01-01';
